attribute.name: managedResource
attribute.description: The managed resource this MBean is associated with

attribute.name: concurrencyControlMode
attribute.description: Concurrent control mode specifies if requests should be executed sequentially

attribute.name: queueSize
attribute.description: Maximum number of pending messages allowed to wait in a queue to be executed

attribute.name: requestsProcessed
attribute.description: number of requests processed by the sip application dispatcher

attribute.name: responsesProcessed
attribute.description: number of responses processed by the sip application dispatcher

attribute.name: numberOfPendingMessages
attribute.description: number of pending messages in all queues for all concurrency control modes.

operation.name: setConcurrencyControlModeByName
operation.description: set concurrency control mode by the string value of the mode, this is needed because you can't set Enum value types from the JMX console

parameter.name: concurrencyControlMode
parameter.description: the concurrency mode, must be one of the following - None, SipSession or SipApplicationSession

operation.name: setMessageQueueSize
operation.description: Sets the number of messages that can go in the queue waiting for a session to be available, this is needed for embedded jopr

parameter.name: queueSize
parameter.description: the number of messages that can go in the queue waiting for a session to be available

operation.name: init
operation.description: Initialize the sip application dispatcher and its associated sip application router implementation

operation.name: getSipFactory
operation.description: retrieve the sip factory used by this application dispatcher
